name: Lights Out! - NOKIA3310
description:
Lights out! is a logic game where the goal is to turn off all the lights in the fewest possible movements.

'Move' with arrow keys or WASD.

'Select' with spacebar.

'X' to get back to main menu.

There are random levels for 3x3 mode, and 5 levels for the other modes.

Made for the NOKIA3310 JAM 3 - #nokiajam
